short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Narrows down your dinner options based on your favorite restaurants.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple app built for cs50x as a final project. 
Features:  
Save favorite restaurants using ratings/ease of to-go/proximity.
Sort list by ratings.
Saves everything locally in browser and persists between sessions.
*important: if you clear data in the browser the list will disappear.
